text:
HRS InnovationHub | Berlin, Germany | Software Engineers | Full-time

The HRS Innovation Hub delivers integrated solutions to the business areas of the HRS Group. Our international team is cross-functional and comprised of experts in the fields of Agile Product Management, Software Engineering, UX/UI Design and IT Operations. All products created by the Innovation Hub are being hosted in the Amazon Web Services cloud and make use of state of the art technologies such as Java, ReactJS, NodeJS, REST APIs and GraphQL.

We are hiring for:

* Fullstack Engineer - https://jobs.hrs.de/en/jobs/job/217011/Full-stack_Developer_...

* Frontend Engineer - https://jobs.hrs.de/en/jobs/job/217010/Frontend_Developer_m_...

* Backend Engineer - https://jobs.hrs.de/en/jobs/job/217007/Backend_Developer_Jav...

Email barbara.kryslak@hrs.de or apply online.
